dstream -> DStream
Please add [MINOR] to the title per https://spark.apache.org/contributing.html

comments.body:
Looks like the `\` causes style checks to fail:
```
./python/pyspark/streaming/dstream.py:421:79: E502 the backslash is redundant between brackets
./python/pyspark/streaming/dstream.py:425:78: E502 the backslash is redundant between brackets
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +419,423 @@        duration = self._jdstream.dstream().slideDuration().milliseconds()
        if int(window * 1000) % duration != 0:
            raise ValueError("windowDuration must be multiple of the parent " \
                             "dstream's slide (batch) duration (%d ms)"
                             % duration)
